name: Bounce (itch) (GreyCray)
description:
An endless runner inspired by the web browser game "Dino Runner".

Bounce is a game with a simple aesthetic of basic geometric shapes wherein you play as a ball and click to dodge all the spikes!

How far can you go? How much can you Score?

Be sure to have a mouse and also checkout some of the short and  neat music I made for the game by clicking on the "Music" button in the main menu!
